lead_paragraph: Former Wallabies winger Digby Ioane has become new Canterbury Crusaders coach Scott Robertson's first big name signing for next season, the team said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Crusaders Snap Up Former Wallabies Winger Ioane
headline.main: Crusaders Snap Up Former Wallabies Winger Ioane

snippet: Former Wallabies winger Digby Ioane has become new Canterbury Crusaders coach Scott Robertson's first big name signing for next season, the team said on Thursday....
